text: tyA#ha yathAyaqjurEqvaitat ki#kkiTAqkAra#M juhOti kikkiTAkAqrENaq vai grAqmyAH paqSavO# ramantEq prA&&*raqNyAH pa#tantiq yat ki#kkiTAqkAra#M juqhOti# grAqmyANA$M paSUqnAM dhRutyaiq parya#gnau kriqyamA#NE juhOtiq jIva#ntImEqvainA(gm)# suvaqrgaM ~MlOqkaM ga#mayatiq tvaM tuqrIyA# vaqSinI# vaqSA&sItyA#ha dEvaqtraivainA$M gamayati saqtyAH sa#ntuq yaja#mAnasyaq kAmAq ityA#haiqSha vai kAmOq -  [  ]    11
